text: pUqShA prASya# daqtO#&ruNaqt tasmA$t pUqShA pra#piqShTaBA#gO&daqntakOq hi taM dEqvA a#bruvaqn vi vA aqyamA$rddhyaprASitriqyO vA aqyama#BUqditiq tad-bRuhaqspata#yEq parya#haraqnth sO#&biBEqd-bRuhaqspati#riqtthaM ~MvAva sya ArtiqmA&ri#ShyaqtItiq sa EqtaM mantra#mapaSyaqth sUrya#sya tvAq cakShu#ShAq prati# paSyAqmItya#bravIqnna hi sUrya#syaq cakShuqH - [  ]  46
